channel.title: Need help with a game error

item.title: Need help with a game error
item.dc:creator: @Linkel Linkel
item.description:
@Linkel wrote:

Ok… so this is a void I have:

public void ModHelp() { sendFrame126("@dre@Moderator Helpmenu", 8144); //Helpmenu title clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("", 8145); sendFrame126("@whi@Welcome back "+playerName, 8146); sendFrame126("@dbl@WebClient : None Yet", 8147); sendFrame126("", 8148); sendFrame126("@dbl@Server owner is: Ash", 8150); sendFrame126("@dre@Ash, Swiz, and Lol", 8151); sendFrame126("@dre@- Commands -", 8153); sendFrame126("::xteletome (playername)", 8154); sendFrame126("::xteleto (playername)", 8155); sendFrame126("::kick (playername)", 8156); sendFrame126("@dre@- For Admins -", 8158); sendFrame126("::banuser (playername)", 8159); sendFrame126("::macrowarn (playername)", 8160); sendFrame126("::update (seconds)", 8161); sendFrame126("@dbl@@dre@~~ Enjoy ~~", 8163); sendFrame126("@dbl@Owners: Ash, Swiz, and Lol", 8164); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); if(server.muteHandler.checkMutedMember(playerName)) { muted = 1; } else if (!server.muteHandler.checkMutedMember(playerName)) { muted = 0; } }

And later on in client.java it says:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modhelp") && (playerRights >= 1)) { ModHelp(); }

But when I type ::modhelp in game, I get Connection lost…

Any ideas?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2007, 05:10:45 PM[/size][hr]Help?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a game error
